```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
weather <- readr::read_csv("data/weather.csv")
weather
```

```{r}
weather %>% 
  select(-"X1")
```

```{r}
glimpse(weather)
```

```{r}
colnames(weather)
```

```{r}
new_factor<- c(1:5,26)
new_numeric<- c(6:25)
weather[,new_factor] <- lapply(weather[,new_factor], as.factor)
weather[,new_numeric] <- lapply(weather[,new_numeric], as.numeric)
lapply(weather, class)
```
